attributes.review: This app took a whole day to download and then it stole all of my information!!! All of my pics were leaked, including the nudes. I never sent them to anyone so it must have been the app.That wasn’t the only suspicious thing. The app also signed me up for calls that came in the middle of the night. Every call is reminding me to vote Trump and it gets pretty redundant. I would’ve forgotten if it weren’t for the first 5, but after that it was just annoying. The same thing happened with text messages. My phone was going off all the time. My phone also over heats whenever I use the app. I would get the black screen with the thermometer and have to put it in the fridge. I don’t recommend this app at all. If I could give it zero stars I would.
attributes.title: Ruined my life🤬

attributes.review: Took many hours to download and once it finished it would not open -193838272/10 would not recommend
attributes.title: Atrocious and absurd app

attributes.review: I downloaded this app with the intention of supporting our wonderful, lovely, handsome, intelligent president Trump. It took several hours to download despite the fact that I have plenty of storage. When it finally completed the download I was so excited to explore what I thought would be a great way to stay in touch with our amazing president. Let me tell you how disappointed I was when I went to open the app and my brand new IPHONE 11 MAX PRO screen COMPLETELY CRACKED! 😤😤 i was so furious i threw my phone across the room and now I’m typing this from an ANDROID 🤮 do not download this unless you want to end up like me 😭 with an Android !
attributes.title: Do NOT download!!!!

attributes.review:
I really liked trump but then I came to realize that he was not racist enough so I feel bad giving this review on this app. And I feel bad that he is working so hard to reach my expectations but haven’t gotten there yet so I’m sorry for leaving this review 

Your best man billy hilly 

Ps if you want to add me on snap it’s billyhilly1234
attributes.title: Love trump

attributes.review: this app did not let me sign in with my phone number, it continuously said “invalid” and i went to FAQ’s and followed all advice given, however, it still did not work. it then took all of my storage and data (an entire 60 MB!!!) i DO NOT recommend this app at all.
attributes.title: no ❤️

attributes.review:
This an absolutely ruined my life. It wiped my entire phone and stole all of my credit card information and began to steal money from me! Do not trust this app!!! It leaks all of your information!!!!! Then the app said the only way to get all of my information back was to vote for Trumpy😢 THEY ARE TRYING TO BRAINWASH YOU!!!!  It is definitely run by the Illuminati. I had to buy a completely new phone after installing this app. Terrible, awful, disgusting, revolting, traumatizing, nasty, gross, bad !!!! -500/10
sincerely, gen z
attributes.title: DO NOT GET THIS APP!!!!!!!!😡😡😡

attributes.review: I downloaded this app thinking it was going to make the App Store great again but all it did was send viruses to my phone and all of my pictures in my library got changed to some weird orange man I don’t even know who that person is but he looks like if a very sick person took a poop after eating 30 bags of Cheetos and had some weird hair like substance on the tip of the poop,Basically now I have to get a new phone because the app hacked my pictures and my phone is just ruined, DONT DOWNLOAD!!!!
attributes.title: DONT DOWNLOAD THIS APP 🤢🤢🤢
